summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that exercises the OpenAI client integration across synchronous and asynchronous contexts, verifying configuration, embedding support, hook management, mode handling with nested models, multimodal (audio/image) processing, concurrent user interactions, parallel tool execution, response patching, retry mechanisms, handling of basic Python types, streaming responses, and validation logic using Pydantic and the instructor library.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability, correctness, and robustness of the OpenAI client implementation for production use, ensuring that all functional aspects—including embeddings, hooks, multimodal inputs, concurrency, retries, and data validation—behave as expected under varied scenarios.
